title: Chairs Pallone and Maloney Request Answers from FDA on the Approval Process for Alzheimer’s Drug Aduhelm
summary: Chairman Pallone and Oversight and Reform Chairwoman Carolyn B. Maloney sent a letter to FDA seeking information regarding the review process and accelerated approval of Biogen Inc.’s Alzheimer’s drug, Aduhelm.

title: Pallone Blasts Supreme Court’s Refusal to Intervene on Implementation of Texas’ Unconstitutional Abortion Ban
summary: Chairman Pallone blasts Supreme Court’s refusal to intervene on implementation of Texas’ unconstitutional abortion ban.
